text: I have worked in the mall for 10 years now and the only place I will eat is Villa Pizza. Their staff is always friendly and helpful. The food is fresh and tastes great! Thank you Wilson and Amir for always giving top notch service with a smile. Also the cookies and brownies are AMAZING!
